meta.description: 25 posts published by Brian Robert Hyland during June 2016

title: Jun 2016 – Page 2 – Conspiracy Daily Update
cleaned_text:
An historical announcement was made to mankind by peace-loving extraterrestrial civilizations.

With this announcement a new era begins in human history.

Mankind sets out to become part of the cosmic society that lives in peace and harmony!

Starting on this day, the extraterrestrial civilizations offer every single person to get in touch with them.

More than 100 people have already engaged in advance as part of so called Extraterrestrial Contact – Initial meetings establishing their individual initial contact with representatives of this civilizations.

These non-public events for a selected audience were held in Germany on April, 16th. -17th, May 14th. -15th. and June, 11th. -12th., 2016.

Participants included amongst others engineers, University professors, and people with a scientific background. Several young people also took part.

These events and wonderful individual Initial contacts with representatives of this peaceful extraterrestrial civilizations were overwhelming and will remain unforgotten for all concerned.

Contact with these civilizations will remain intact for each Individual participant after these events if they so wish and have since continued very intensively and further developed.

In the context of these two-day events, participants have been thoroughly prepared for this initial contact and gently accompanied and looked after by experienced telepaths.

Worldwide there is already a large number of telepaths who in part – though not yet publicly known – have been in close contact with these civilizations for many years now.

Over the coming weeks and months, more and more of these telepaths will come forward and are happy to accompany people on their way into the New Age and supporting them in individual initial contacts. Contacts and address details in your country will be gradually be published on this website.

A few days after the promulgation of the message we will – initially in the German-speaking area – start inviting scientists and media representatives to enable an individual initial contact. These initial contacts are prepared and coordinated with the extraterrestrial civilizations.

Contacts with extraterrestrial civilizations are for the benefit of all mankind.

The time has come now, where extraterrestrial civilizations hold out their hands and offer all people to make contact with them.

It is the time, humanity enters into a new, wonderful era characterised by peace and harmony.

It is the time, where humanity enters the cosmic society!
